root.name: FiNCK
root.description: Nifflas has stated that the game will be rather different than his previous ambiance-driven games and that the main character is not Juni. As stated by Nifflas: "It won't be Juni, she's too nice and harmless. To me, this game is a break I need from my seriousness and deeper meaning, so it has to be a character who have a personality that lets him/her run around and e.g. throw bombs at random creatures and enemies."
